content: a bold floral motif popping with colour and texture **this is the march main square for the 2024 block-a-month crochet-along bamcal which can be found here 1 - very honoured to be part of this lovely international event you can join in at any time ** the pattern is 9 pages long with clear instructions and round-by-round photos to help you along as much as possible ideally two sizes of hook are needed depending on your gauge and choice of yarn for example 4 mm and 4 5 mm for dk 5 mm and 5 5mm for aran/worsted weight this design also forms the centre of my kitchen garden a much larger afghan pattern available from my shop here 2 the isobel grace section named after my granddaughter will always be free to download thank you very much to all the invaluable testers on the bamcal team 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/2024-crochet-block-a-month-cal 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/my-kitchen-garden
